transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, yes sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: I am speaking with your account manager from IndiaMART sir. Aapne kal, ye kuch kal aapne mere number pe call kar diya, incoming call kar diya tha regarding aapke ticket raise ho gaya hai.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Kiske liye? Sir aapne call kiya hoga aur by mistake aapne by mistake call kar diya tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan sir, usi ke behalf pe ticket raise ho gaya tha, toh usi ke liye maine aapko call back kiya hua hai. Toh aap mujhe bata sakte ho ki aapko kya issue ho raha tha toh aapne kal call kiya tha uske regarding?
Customer: Uh, GPPS ke liye, GPPS ka party chahiye mere ko chahiye.
Executive: Kya sir, kya chahiye?
Customer: GP, uh, GPPS hai na?
Executive: Sir aapke jo products hai woh PP scrap, plastic scrap, LDP scrap, ye sab hai.
Customer: Black, black hai, color hai, black color aur white crystal, PC.
Executive: Haan, ye sab hai na, toh aapko kis cheez ka buylead ka concern ho raha hai?
Customer: Ye, ye sab mujhe sell karna hai.
Executive: Sell karna hai?
Customer: Haan, mere ko sell karna hai.
Executive: Matlab aapko iska buylead chahiye, right?
Customer: Buyers chahiye.
Executive: Achha, toh sir aapko iska buylead show nahi hota kya aapki service pe?
Customer: Kya, kya ji?
Executive: Aapka jo catalog hai, toh matlab aapke products jaha pe IndiaMART ka aata hai, waha pe aapko iska buylead show nahi hota?
Customer: Woh mera bhai dekhta hai actually pura, woh last two, haan, woh dekhte usko phone aayega hoga shayad.
Executive: Nahi sir, aapke number se hi mere paas phone aaya tha toh mujhe aapki ticket close karne ke liye concern lena hota hai. Isiliye maine aapko, mera, mera number se phone aaya?
Customer: Yes sir, aapke number se hi phone aaya, yehi number se aapne kal phone kiya tha. Customer care pe aapne by mistake phone kar diya toh waha se ticket raise ho jaata hai toh woh disclose karne ke liye humne aapko phone kiya. Agar aapko kuch issue hota hai toh aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, nahi yeh number, toh, toh ab mai aapko phone karta hu.
Executive: Nahi sir, ek minute, ek minute, ek minute. Sir aapke paas ek mail aayega.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, jisme aapko satisfy, satisfy mark karna hoga, jisse ki aapka closer, yeh ticket jo hai woh band ho jaaye uske regarding.
Customer: Kya bol raha hai?
Executive: Sir aapki jo mail ID hai na, jo aapne isme mail ID lagai hui hai, uske, ke naam se IndiaMART ke naam se aapke paas ek mail jaayega ki aapne jo abhi baat ki thi woh aap satisfied ho us baat se ki nahi satisfied ho. Toh aapko satisfy mark karna hoga.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay, satisfy mark karega.
Executive: Haan, toh sir abhi aap mujhe jaise aap bata rahe the ki aapke paas kiski buyleads nahi aa rahi hai, aap ek baar mujhe bata sakte ho?
Customer: Ek minute, ek minute, na matlab it's buyers means, the market IndiaMART.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji sir, kis kiski aapko buylead chahiye thi?
Customer: Ye kaun hai?
Executive: Haanji sir?
Customer: Hello? Aap bolo, ye kaun hai?
Executive: Uh, from IndiaMART sir.
Customer: Okay, so IndiaMART which, which part?
Executive: Sir, mai aapka account manager sir. Sir by mistake matlab aapne toh customer care pe phone kar diya tha, usi ke regarding humne aapko phone kiya hai.
Customer: Theek hai, mera ko dusra call kuch aata nahi, mai call kar raha hai, mai buyers se mai buyleads mai mai number dekh raha hai. Isme mai na dusra number se call kar raha hai, yeh phone se seedha, seedha nahi kar raha hai.
Executive: Uh, sir matlab woh mai samjhi nahi aap kya kehna chah rahe ho?
Customer: [unintelligible]
Executive: Matlab aapko buylead aata hai par aap usme call back nahi kar paate?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi aata hai, nahi aata hai. Mera buylead nahi aata hai.
Executive: Achha aapke paas buylead nahi aata hai, achha.
Customer: Nahi, ya, ya.
Executive: Toh matlab sir jaise aapke jo products hai yeh PP scrap, gas and green scrap, iski buylead nahi aati hai aapko?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Matlab jo aapke product hai na yeh SPDP scrap, PP scrap.
Customer: Ya, ya, ya, ya, ya, achha.
Executive: Haan, iski buylead show nahi hoti aapko?
Customer: Uh, kuch nahi matlab, mera, mera buylead se na mai dusra aadmi ko number dal raha hai, isme bhi mai dusra number se call kar raha hai usko.
Executive: Kaunse number se aap?
Customer: Toh mera ko seedha call nahi aata hai.
Executive: Achha, jo aapka dusra number hai 981.
Customer: Mai, mai yeh dusra mera proprietor number wala hai yeh dusra call se kar raha hai. Mai seedha number click kar raha hai woh copy paste karke dusra number se call kar raha hai.
Executive: Achha matlab aapke paas jo call aati hai woh dusre number se call kar deta hai woh aap call nahi karta, right?
Customer: Ya, ya.
Executive: Achha, toh sir aap apna primary number aap change kar lijiye na.
Customer: Woh mai, theek hai, mere ko, mere ko seedha mera number nahi aata hai, woh kyu hai?
Executive: Matlab number nahi aata hai, toh samajh nahi paayi aapko. Woh mai, mai ready karega baad mein, theek hai, mai woh mera PM, PM hai ready karega baad mein.
Executive: Achha, achha. Toh sir aapki jo yeh ticket open hui hai, toh.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants buyleads for his products.

- Customer is not receiving direct calls.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the ticket closure process.

- Executive asked the customer to change primary number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will get the issue resolved later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, ticket, primary number
